Mod2_Description: Gain {c_number}{SF_21}{/c} Energy per cast of {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} when it damages a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy.
Mod3_Description: {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds after you Evade.
Mod4_Description: Each subsequent arrow from {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} has {c_number}[{SF_19}*100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance, up to {c_number}[{SF_19}*{SF_10}*100|%+|]{/c} for the {c_number}{SF_10}th{/c} arrow.
name: Rapid Fire
